meanings.definition: The fibrous residue left after sugarcane or similar plants have been crushed for their juice.
meanings.sent1: The bagasses were used to make paper products.
meanings.sent2: Farmers collect bagasses to use as animal feed.
meanings.sent3: The bagasses decided to have a dance party in the field.
meanings.sent4: The bagasses of ideas in his mind were overflowing.
meanings.sent5: The sweet smell of bagasses filled the air at the sugar mill.

meanings.definition: The dry pulpy residue left after the extraction of juice from sugar cane.
meanings.sent1: She used bagasses to create eco-friendly packaging.
meanings.sent2: The bagasses were piled up behind the sugar factory.
meanings.sent3: The bagasses tried to sneak into the movie theater.
meanings.sent4: His words were like bagasses, dry and lacking substance.
meanings.sent5: The bagasses crunched underfoot as they walked through the field.
